messages.content: ComfyUI-SizeFromPresets is a custom node for ComfyUI that adds nodes which output the width and height of the size selected from the preset.

To install ComfyUI-SizeFromPresets, you need to navigate to the <ComfyUI directory>/custom_nodes and clone the GitHub repository by executing the command `git clone https://github.com/nkchocoai/ComfyUI-SizeFromPresets.git`.
What are the nodes available in ComfyUI-SizeFromPresets for SD1.5?
For SD1.5, ComfyUI-SizeFromPresets provides two nodes: Size From Presets (SD1.5) and Empty Latent Image From Presets (SD1.5).
What data do these nodes output?

The Size From Presets (SD1.5) node outputs the width and height of the selected preset, while the Empty Latent Image From Presets (SD1.5) node outputs an empty latent image, along with the width and height of the selected preset.
How can I set presets for SD1.5 nodes?
Presets for the SD1.5 nodes can be set from the `presets/sd15.csv` file.
What are the nodes available in ComfyUI-SizeFromPresets for SDXL?
For SDXL, ComfyUI-SizeFromPresets provides two nodes: Size From Presets (SDXL) and Empty Latent Image From Presets (SDXL).
What data do these nodes output?

The Size From Presets (SDXL) node outputs the width and height of the selected preset, while the Empty Latent Image From Presets (SDXL) node outputs an empty latent image, along with the width and height of the selected preset.
How can I set presets for SDXL nodes?
Presets for the SDXL nodes can be set from the `presets/sdxl.csv` file.
What is the purpose of the Random ... From Presets (SD...) nodes?

The Random ... From Presets (SD...) nodes allow for randomly selecting presets from the CSV file. For Size, it outputs the width and height of the selected preset, and for Empty Latent Image, it outputs an empty latent image along with the width and height of the selected preset.
